attributes.action: give free milk and one piece of fruit to children in education up to the age of eleven.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free milk and one piece of fruit should be given to children in education up to the age of eleven. This is to try and encourage parents and guardians to do so at home. it has been proven that children who obtain milk tend to have a higher IQ at the age of eighteen than children who don’t. Milk and fruit for children also means a healthier future generation.
